00016 subroutine XMLoutput
00017 use strings
00018 use orbitals
00019 implicit none
00020 character*100 printval
00021 integer n, i, j 
00022 character*40 out(20), pval, fileN, DLAB, ival, jval
00023 logical ex
00024 real*8 dist(4)
00025 
00026 open(16,file="../TI.xml", status="replace")
00027 
00028 printval='<pair name="'//trim(plabel)//'">'
00029 write(16,*) trim(printval)
00030 
00031 ! workaround for distances (-> rates)
00032 fileN = '../'//trim(plabel)//'.dist'
00033 inquire(file=fileN, exist=ex) 
00034 if ( ex ) then
00035    open(15,file=fileN,status='old')
00036    read(15,*) DLAB, dist(:)
00037    close(15)
00038 else
00039    dist = 0.0d0
00040 end if
00041 
00042 write(16,*) '   <parameters>'
00043 write(pval,*) homoAind(1)
00044 CALL REMOVESP(pval)
00045 printval='      <HOMO_A>'// trim(pval) // '</HOMO_A>'
00046 write(16,*) trim(printval)
00047 
00048 write(pval,*) homoAsub
00049 CALL REMOVESP(pval)
00050 printval='      <NoccA>' // trim(pval) // '</NoccA>'
00051 write(16,*) trim(printval)
00052 
00053 write(pval,*) lumoAind(1)
00054 CALL REMOVESP(pval)
00055 printval='      <LUMO_A>'// trim(pval) // '</LUMO_A>'
00056 write(16,*) trim(printval)
00057 
00058 write(pval,*) lumoAsub
00059 CALL REMOVESP(pval)
00060 printval='      <NvirtA>' // trim(pval) // '</NvirtA>'
00061 write(16,*) trim(printval)
00062 
00063 write(pval,*) homoBind(1)
00064 CALL REMOVESP(pval)
00065 printval='      <HOMO_B>' // trim(pval) // '</HOMO_B>'
00066 write(16,*) trim(printval)
00067 
00068 write(pval,*) homoBsub
00069 CALL REMOVESP(pval)
00070 printval='      <NoccB>' // trim(pval) // '</NoccB>'
00071 write(16,*) trim(printval)
00072 
00073 write(pval,*) lumoBind(1)
00074 CALL REMOVESP(pval)
00075 printval='      <LUMO_B>' // trim(pval) // '</LUMO_B>'
00076 write(16,*) trim(printval)
00077 
00078 write(pval,*) lumoBsub
00079 CALL REMOVESP(pval)
00080 printval='      <NvirtB>' // trim(pval) // '</NvirtB>'
00081 write(16,*) trim(printval)
00082 
00083 
00084 write(16,*) '   </parameters>'
00085 write(16,*) '    <transport name="hole">'
00086 write(16,*) '        <channel name="single">'
00087 if (QCP.eq."T") then
00088    write(pval,*) J_hole(1,1)
00089 else
00090    write(pval,*) J_hole(homoAsub,homoBsub)
00091 end if
00092 CALL REMOVESP(pval)
00093 printval='            <J>' // trim(pval) // '</J>'
00094 write(16,*) trim(printval)
00095 
00096 if ( QCP .eq. "T" ) then
00097    write(pval,*) dimen(homoAind(1))
00098 else if ( QCP .eq. "G" ) then   
00099    write(pval,*) molAener(homoAsub)
00100 else if (QCP.eq."GW")  then
00101    write(pval,*) QPE_molA(homoAsub)
00102 end if
00103 
00104 CALL REMOVESP(pval)
00105 printval='            <e_A>' // trim(pval) // '</e_A>'
00106 write(16,*) trim(printval)
00107 if ( QCP .eq. "T" ) then
00108    write(pval,*) dimen(homoBind(1))
00109 else if (QCP .eq. "G") then
00110    write(pval,*) molBener(homoBsub)
00111 else if (QCP .eq. "GW") then
00112    write(pval,*) QPE_molB(homoBsub)
00113 end if
00114 CALL REMOVESP(pval)
00115 printval='            <e_B>' // trim(pval) // '</e_B>'
00116 write(16,*) trim(printval)
00117 write(16,*) '        </channel>'
00118 write(16,*) '        <channel name="multi">'
00119 write(16,*) '           <molecule name="A">'
00120 do i = 1, homoAsub
00121    write(ival,*) i-1
00122    CALL REMOVESP(ival)
00123    if ( QCP .eq. "T" ) then
00124       write(pval,*) dimen(homoAind(i))
00125    else if (QCP .eq. "G") then
00126       write(pval,*) molAener(homoAsub+1-i)
00127    elseif (QCP.eq."GW") then
00128       write(pval,*) QPE_molA(homoAsub+1-i)
00129    end if
00130    CALL REMOVESP(pval)
00131    printval='               <e_HOMOm'//trim(ival)//'>'//trim(pval) // '</e_HOMOm'//trim(ival)//'>'
00132    write(16,*) trim(printval)
00133 end do
00134 write(16,*) '           </molecule>'
00135 write(16,*) '           <molecule name="B">'
00136 do i = 1, homoBsub
00137    write(ival,*) i-1
00138    CALL REMOVESP(ival)
00139    if ( QCP .eq. "T" ) then 
00140       write(pval,*) dimen(homoBind(i))
00141    else if (QCP.eq."G") then
00142       write(pval,*) molBener(homoBsub+1-i)
00143    else if (QCP.eq."GW") then
00144       write(pval,*) QPE_molB(homoBsub+1-i)
00145    end if
00146    CALL REMOVESP(pval)
00147    printval='               <e_HOMOm'//trim(ival)//'>'//trim(pval) // '</e_HOMOm'//trim(ival)//'>'
00148    write(16,*) trim(printval)
00149 end do
00150 write(16,*) '           </molecule>'
00151 
00152 write(16,*) '               <dimer name="integrals">'
00153 do i = 1, homoAsub
00154    write(ival,*) i-1
00155    CALL REMOVESP(ival)
00156    do j = 1, homoBsub   
00157       write(jval,*) j-1
00158       CALL REMOVESP(jval)
00159       if (QCP.eq."T") then
00160          write(pval,*) J_hole(i,j)
00161       else
00162          write(pval,*) J_hole(homoAsub+1-i,homoBsub+1-j)
00163       end if
00164       CALL REMOVESP(pval)
00165       printval='                    <T_'//trim(ival)//trim(jval)//'>'//trim(pval) // '</T_'//trim(ival)//trim(jval)//'>'
00166       write(16,*) trim(printval)
00167    end do
00168 end do
00169 write(pval,*) J_sq_degen_h
00170 CALL REMOVESP(pval)
00171 printval='                    <J_sq_degen>'//trim(pval) // '</J_sq_degen>'
00172 write(16,*) trim(printval)
00173 write(pval,*) J_sq_boltz_h
00174 CALL REMOVESP(pval)
00175 printval='                    <J_sq_boltz>'//trim(pval) // '</J_sq_boltz>'
00176 write(16,*) trim(printval)
00177 write(16,*) '               </dimer>'
00178 write(16,*) '        </channel>'
00179 write(16,*) '    </transport>'
00180 !!$
00181 !!$
00182 write(16,*) '    <transport name="electron">'
00183 write(16,*) '        <channel name="single">'
00184 
00185 write(pval,*) J_elec(1,1)
00186 CALL REMOVESP(pval)
00187 printval='            <J>' // trim(pval) // '</J>'
00188 write(16,*) trim(printval)
00189 if (QCP .eq. "T" ) then
00190    write(pval,*) dimen(lumoAind(1))
00191 else if (QCP.eq."G") then
00192    write(pval,*) molAener(homoAsub+1)
00193 else if (QCP.eq."GW") then
00194    write(pval,*) QPE_molA(homoAsub+1)
00195 end if
00196 CALL REMOVESP(pval)
00197 printval='            <e_A>' // trim(pval) // '</e_A>'
00198 write(16,*) trim(printval)
00199 if (QCP .eq."T" ) then
00200    write(pval,*) dimen(lumoBind(1))
00201 else if (QCP.eq."G") then
00202    write(pval,*) molBener(homoBsub+1)
00203 else if (QCP.eq."GW") then
00204    write(pval,*) QPE_molB(homoBsub+1)
00205 end if
00206 CALL REMOVESP(pval)
00207 printval='            <e_B>' // trim(pval) // '</e_B>'
00208 write(16,*) trim(printval)
00209 write(16,*) '        </channel>'
00210 write(16,*) '        <channel name="multi">'
00211 write(16,*) '               <molecule name="A">'
00212 
00213 do i = 1, lumoAsub
00214    write(ival,*) i-1
00215    CALL REMOVESP(ival)
00216    if (QCP .eq. "T") then
00217       write(pval,*) dimen(lumoAind(i))
00218    else if (QCP.eq."G")then
00219       write(pval,*) molAener(homoAsub+i)
00220    elseif (QCP.eq."GW") then
00221       write(pval,*) QPE_molA(homoAsub+i)
00222    end if
00223    CALL REMOVESP(pval)
00224    printval='                    <e_LUMOp'//trim(ival)//'>'//trim(pval)//'</e_LUMOp'//trim(ival)//'>'
00225    write(16,*) trim(printval)
00226 end do
00227 
00228 write(16,*) '               </molecule>'
00229 write(16,*) '               <molecule name="B">'
00230 
00231 do i = 1, lumoBsub
00232    write(ival,*) i-1
00233    CALL REMOVESP(ival)
00234    if (QCP .eq. "T" ) then
00235       write(pval,*) dimen(lumoBind(i))
00236    else if (QCP.eq."G") then
00237       write(pval,*) molBener(homoBsub+i)
00238    else if (QCP.eq."GW") then
00239       write(pval,*) QPE_molB(homoBsub+i)
00240    end if
00241    CALL REMOVESP(pval)
00242    printval='                    <e_LUMOp'//trim(ival)//'>'//trim(pval)//'</e_LUMOp'//trim(ival)//'>'
00243    write(16,*) trim(printval)
00244 end do
00245 write(16,*) '               </molecule>'
00246 write(16,*) '               <dimer name="integrals">'
00247 do i = 1, lumoAsub
00248    write(ival,*) i-1
00249    CALL REMOVESP(ival)
00250    do j = 1, lumoBsub   
00251       write(jval,*) j-1
00252       CALL REMOVESP(jval)
00253       write(pval,*) J_elec(i,j)
00254       CALL REMOVESP(pval)
00255       printval='                    <T_'//trim(ival)//trim(jval)//'>'//trim(pval) // '</T_'//trim(ival)//trim(jval)//'>'
00256       write(16,*) trim(printval)
00257    end do
00258 end do      
00259 write(pval,*) J_sq_degen_e
00260 CALL REMOVESP(pval)
00261 printval='                    <J_sq_degen>'//trim(pval) // '</J_sq_degen>'
00262 write(16,*) trim(printval)
00263 write(pval,*) J_sq_boltz_e
00264 CALL REMOVESP(pval)
00265 printval='                    <J_sq_boltz>'//trim(pval) // '</J_sq_boltz>'
00266 write(16,*) trim(printval)
00267 write(16,*) '               </dimer>'
00268 write(16,*) '        </channel>'
00269 write(16,*) '    </transport>'
00270 write(16,*) '</pair>'
00271 !!$
00272 !!$     
00273 !!$
00274 end subroutine XMLoutput
